mapper.select: select c.character_seq, c.nickname, f.file_path from tb_character c LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file f ON f.relation_tb = 'tb_character' AND f.relation_seq = c.character_seq where c.nickname like CONCAT(#{text}, '%') AND c.character_active = 1

select c.character_seq, c.nickname, f.file_path, co.content_seq, co.content_text from tb_character c LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file f ON f.relation_tb = 'tb_character' AND f.relation_seq = c.character_seq JOIN tb_content co ON co.character_seq = c.character_seq where co.content_text like CONCAT('%', #{text}, '%') AND co.content_is_public = 1 AND co.content_is_active = 1 AND c.character_active = 1 ORDER BY co.content_created_date DESC

select s.storage_seq, s.storage_name, f.file_path from tb_storage s LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file f ON f.relation_tb = 'tb_storage' AND f.relation_seq = s.storage_seq where s.storage_name like CONCAT('%', #{text}, '%') AND s.storage_public = 1

select big.tag_text, (select count(*) from tb_tag small where small.tag_text = big.tag_text) AS tag_count FROM tb_tag big where big.tag_text like CONCAT('%', #{text}, '%') GROUP BY tag_text ORDER BY tag_count DESC;
mapper.insert: insert INTO tb_search_history (character_seq, search_history_text, search_date) VALUES (#{characterSeq}, #{searchHistoryText}, now())
mapper.select: select IFNULL((select search_weight FROM tb_search_cloud WHERE search_word = #{searchWord} AND search_date = #{searchDate}), 0) AS search_weight
mapper.insert: insert INTO tb_search_cloud (search_word, search_weight, search_date) VALUES (#{searchWord}, 1, #{searchDate})
